nodes.title: about me
nodes.info: Greetings! I’m currently a penultimate year undergraduate at the National University of Singapore’s School of Computing, pursuing a Computer Science degree. I’ve developed a keen passion for the fields of software engineering and artificial intelligence, often intrigued by technology’s ability to immensely improve our quality of life. Being an advocate of constant self-learning and discovery, I’m motivated, driven and always seeking to contribute towards meaningful projects. Experience in programming languages include Java, JavaScript and Python. Outside of academics, I enjoy most things any young adult would. I'm an avid lover of sports especially soccer and swimming. My friends and family are of utmost importance to me, and I will certainly take the time to catch-up despite hectic schedules.
